profile.title: Developer
profile.WID: Currently enrolled as a Full Stack Development student at Lambda School I spend hours a day learning new technologies to add to my development stack. I've fallen in love with the process of starting a week knowing nothing, grappling with the concept and then finishing my week knowing more about this topic than I could have ever imagined. I look forward to continuing this passion for problem solving and self growth as my career as a developer grows.
